Subject: How to disable DNS resolving? Why does it need to resolve DNS anyways?

Hi,

I have been using Heritrix a few days now, but it is very frustrating.=
 Am I right if I say that with Heritrix you cant disable DNS resolving?

Fo=
r some technical reasons, I have to crawl through a proxy and the domains c=
annot be resolved. And crawlers like Nutch dont have any problem with this.=
 But with Heritrix I just cant get the config right.

And after looking at =
some old and scarce posts about this topic, I wonder if it is possible to d=
isable DNS at all.

Any clues would be very appreciated!  Thank you.

Regar=
ds,
LP
